## AI Optimization Checklist

**This repository is AI-optimized. Please follow these guidelines:**

### Documentation
- [ ] Keep documentation concise (no verbose explanations)
- [ ] Update README only if architecture changes
- [ ] Use QUICKSTART for new setup steps
- [ ] Add technical details to docs/ with INDEX.md update
- [ ] Avoid duplication (single source of truth)
- [ ] No historical/legacy content (only current state)

### Code
- [ ] Comment style: signal-based (not tutorials)
- [ ] Function names: self-documenting
- [ ] No TODO comments (create issues instead)
- [ ] Keep files focused (single responsibility)

### Tests
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added if needed
- [ ] CI/CD pipeline runs successfully

## Testing

```bash
# Commands you ran to test
docker-compose up -d --build
docker-compose ps
docker-compose logs -f
```

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows repository style
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Tests added/updated (if needed)
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] AI optimization maintained (no verbose docs added)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented)
